column5: was browsing websites and trying to figure out what tackle box to get for all my lures, tires of browsing through different plano boxes, and came upon this site that make plexiglass boxes.  does anyone tried to make something similar ? i have alot plexiglass laying around the house, would love to try to make one just for my needs that would fit a sport bag.  http://store.justencase.com/onthewater.aspx
